short_summary: The Science and Parliamentary Infrastructure Branch has a temporary workload increase requirement. This requirement necessitates the services of temporary employees 1.13 Clerks, Records management. The purpose of this request is to complete a large paper document project.
description: This tender acknowledges that the Science and Parliamentary Infrastructure Branch has experienced an increased demand for temporary workload for fellow Clerks, Records management to serve on a workforce of 1.13 representative clerks to support a large document project
full_summary:
================edla,sdkfjak
**Title**: Clerk, Records Management #1.13

### Title Information

* Title: Clerk, Records Management #1.13
* Title in French: Commis a la gestion des dossiers #1.13

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-763-70430132
* **Solicitation Number**: 10077978
* **Publication Date**: January 19, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 26, 2024 at 14:00
* **Amendment Date**: January 26, 2024
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering (Méthode concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif)

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Public Services and Procurement Canada (Services publics et approvisionnement Canada)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Rue Laurier, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0H3, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Name**: Eric Beaudry
	+ **Email**: eric.beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ **Phone**: (873) 355-4728

### Tender Description

The Science and Parliamentary Infrastructure Branch requires temporary clerical services for records management to complete a large paper document project. The services required are for a duration of [insert duration].

### Selection Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* Region: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Region of delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Attachments

The tender notice and attachments can be found at the following URLs:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29965/npp-10077978-clerk-record-management_0.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29965/apm-100779
